summary: QuantumoneyAR.app is a companion AR/mobile app for Quantumoney.app — both belong to the same project and must share the same Internet Identity Principal and ICP canisters. quantumoneyar.app is intended for the Android Play Store. Authentication uses Internet Identity (identity.ic0.app). QMY is a cryptocurrency being created via a separate wallet.
architectural_notes: Both quantumoney.app and quantumoneyar.app are the SAME project — quantumoneyar.app is the Android Play Store app
Internet Identity provider: identity.ic0.app (no local/alternative auth allowed)

All canisters are shared: Frontend crjop-jyaaa-aaaah-atfaq-cai, Docs whu4t-kiaaa-aaaah-qsc5q-cai, Treasury nemlr-6aaaa-aaaan-q32la-cai, Logic ckmsk-taaaa-aaaah-atfca-cai, QMY Ledger 5o54h-giaaa-aaaad-aentq-cai
QMY is a cryptocurrency being created via the wallet above — not stored locally
known_issues: quantumoneyar.app is currently using different canisters/identity than quantumoney.app, causing duplicate profiles and divergent balances

new_feature_requests.summary: Unify authentication: quantumoneyar.app must use the same Internet Identity (identity.ic0.app) and return the same Principal as quantumoney.app
Connect quantumoneyar.app to the same ICP canisters used by quantumoney.app (Frontend: crjop-jyaaa-aaaah-atfaq-cai, Ledger: 5o54h-giaaa-aaaad-aentq-cai, Treasury: nemlr-6aaaa-aaaan-q32la-cai, etc.)
Eliminate duplicate profiles: same login ID must produce the same profile, XP, QMY balance, and history across both domains

Configure Internet Identity authentication in quantumoneyar.app to use exclusively identity.ic0.app as the identity provider — the same provider used by quantumoney.app — so that logging in with the same Internet Identity account on both domains produces the exact same Principal.

Point all backend canister calls in quantumoneyar.app to the same canisters used by quantumoney.app: Frontend/Website crjop-jyaaa-aaaah-atfaq-cai, Gold Paper & Docs whu4t-kiaaa-aaaah-qsc5q-cai, Governance/Treasury nemlr-6aaaa-aaaan-q32la-cai, Logic ckmsk-taaaa-aaaah-atfca-cai, QMY Ledger 5o54h-giaaa-aaaad-aentq-cai. Remove or override any hardcoded canister IDs that differ from these values.

Clear all stale identity and session data (localStorage keys related to identity, principal, and session) on app initialization in quantumoneyar.app, then force a fresh Internet Identity login so no outdated principal from a previous misconfigured session persists.
